name: charge-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
